name: The Little Pawn That Could
description:
Everything a pawn needs is a little more money, power, weapons and opportunity to get free. I can give you some. the rest will wait for you on your way. The king is what we aim for. Hurry up, the castle is changing again!

The Little Pawn That Could is a procedural generated dungeon crawler mixing chess with deck building card game.

Game created during Global Game Jam 2022 - local jam hub KrakJam. Fully created in Unity
